backend/main.mo: Defines core types and in-memory maps for products, orders, inquiries, carousels, categories, user profiles, and site content in a Motoko actor.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence with related files, components, and test IDs for checkout coupon, UPI payments, and order total alignment features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides human‑written summaries of major frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and admin tools.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base layer defining color tokens, themes, and global styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file bootstrapping the React SPA by loading main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theme provider, layout, profile setup modal, and lazy‑loaded pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/CarouselMa: Admin UI for managing up to five carousel slides, including image upload, optimization, editing, reordering, and enabling/disabling.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryCa: Admin interface for editing category-specific carousels with image slots, optimization, uploads, and batch save.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiryMan: Admin tool to view customer inquiries and send responses, with indicators for pending and answered messages.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderManag: Admin dashboard for viewing orders, updating order statuses, formatting details, and printing order summaries.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductFor: Modal form for creating or editing products, handling text fields, category, stock, and media upload with optimization and previews.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductMan: Admin interface to list, create, edit, and delete products with modal integration and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/SiteConten: Form-based admin panel for editing site-wide content such as contact info, policies, and static text.
frontend/src/components/CategoryCarousel: Category carousel component that fetches category slides, filters enabled ones, and renders an auto‑rotating, hover‑pausing slider with navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/CategoryImageCar: A category-specific 1:1 image carousel with auto-rotation, hover pause, slide navigation, and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/checkout/CouponC: Checkout widget to apply or remove coupon codes with inline validation and status display.
frontend/src/components/checkout/UpiQrCo: Generates and displays a UPI payment QR code and allows copying the UPI link.
frontend/src/components/CustomerPageStyl: A wrapper component that adds a data attribute to scope customer page styles.
frontend/src/components/footer/FooterSys: Footer component rendering branding, contact info, policy links, and optional footer text.
frontend/src/components/HomeCarousel.tsx: A homepage 16:9 carousel that fetches slides, auto-rotates, supports hover pause, ordering, and click redirects.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: The main site layout with header navigation, auth handling, category routing, scroll-based header compression, and global footer.
frontend/src/components/OrderDetailModal: A modal showing order details with status display, cancellation flow, and reason input handling.
frontend/src/components/ProductMediaCaro: A product media carousel displaying video then images with slide navigation and a square aspect ratio.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal form that collects and saves a user's profile, updates related queries, and shows feedback to the user.
frontend/src/components/RouteLoadingFall: Skeleton-based loading placeholder used while lazy-loaded routes are fetched.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Empty placeholder file for a Stripe setup modal component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminUiBodyAttribu: Sets a data-admin-ui attribute on the document body while active to enable admin‑scoped styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Zustand store for cart items with add, remove, quantity updates, totals, and persisted storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useCategoryCarouselQu: React Query hooks to fetch and update category‑specific carousel images using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useFooterVariant.ts: Returns a fixed footer variant value of 'split'.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login/clear actions, and loads or restores identity using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profile, admin status, carousels, categories, products, orders, and related mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining extensive color and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint initializing React, QueryClient, identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page showing stats and management tabs, gated by admin access checks.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the shopping cart, handling authentication, empty cart states, item quantity updates, removal, and price formatting.
frontend/src/pages/categories/AnkletsPag: Empty file intended to define the Anklets category page.
frontend/src/pages/categories/BridalJewe: Empty file intended to define the Bridal Jewellery category page.
frontend/src/pages/categories/CategoryNo: Empty file intended to define a fallback page for invalid category routes.
frontend/src/pages/categories/CategoryPa: Reusable template for category pages that filters products, displays carousels, and supports cart and buy-now interactions.
frontend/src/pages/categories/EarringsPa: Empty file intended to define the Earrings category page.
frontend/src/pages/categories/LabGrownDi: Uses the category template to render the lab-grown diamonds jewellery category.
frontend/src/pages/categories/NecklacePa: Empty file intended to define the Necklace category page.
Empty file intended to define the Rings category page.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles multi‑step checkout with address entry, coupon logic, pricing calculation, and UPI payment initiation before order creation.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides an authenticated contact form for submitting customer inquiries to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerDashboardPage: Shows authenticated users their orders and inquiries, with order status display and modal details.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing carousels, product listings, and actions for adding items to cart or navigating to product details.
frontend/src/pages/ProductCategoryPage.t: Renders a category page that filters products by slug, shows carousels, and supports add-to-cart and buy-now actions with auth checks.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single product with media carousel, quantity controls, and purchase actions, handling loading, missing data, and auth states.
frontend/src/utils/device.ts: Provides mobile-device detection using navigator.userAgentData with a user-agent fallback.
frontend/src/utils/mediaOptimization.ts: Implements client-side image resizing/compression and basic video preview generation for media uploads.
frontend/src/utils/pricing.ts: Utility module for cart pricing, coupon validation, discounts, line totals, and INR formatting.
frontend/src/utils/productCategories.ts: Defines product categories and provides helpers to validate slugs, retrieve categories, and generate select options.
frontend/src/utils/upi.ts: Generates UPI deep links, including a helper for Aurelie Fine Jewellery payments.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routing), storing and retrieving them from sessionStorage, and persisting or clearing parameters across navigations.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind styling, theme extensions, colors, container settings, and includes typography, container-queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project state for an e-commerce checkout system, including UPI payment and coupon features with their requirements and metadata.
